remarks: Value of the permutation sign function.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Aug-2015.)
statement:
psgnval.g $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` D ) $.
psgnval.t $e |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` D ) $.
psgnval.n $e |- N = ( pmSgn ` D ) $.
psgnval $p |- ( P e. dom N -> ( N ` P ) = ( iota s E. w e. Word T ( P = ( G gsum w ) /\ s = ( -u 1 ^ ( # ` w ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d D s w $.
$d G s w $.
$d N s w $.
$d P s w $.
$d T s w $.
